channel.title: [Delta]How do I cange npcs stance direction?
channel.description: What i mean stance direction on a npc is that lets say a npc spans and looks south how do I change that so that npcs can look in a different direction such as east, west, or north? here is my autospawn code for the npc [code] //------NPCID---CoordX--Coordy--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption\\ spawn = 1974 2855 9778 0 0 0 0 0 2 Bandos God[/code] btw I did change the 2 from a 1 to a 2 and it did nothing

item.title: [Delta]How do I cange npcs stance direction?
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:1, topic:463260”]What i mean stance direction on a npc is that lets say a npc spans and looks south how do I change that so that npcs can look in a different direction such as east, west, or north?
here is my autospawn code for the npc

//------NPCID---CoordX--Coordy--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption\\ spawn = 1974 2855 9778 0 0 0 0 0 2 Bandos God
btw I did change the 2 from a 1 to a 2 and it did nothing[/quote]

Havent done private servers in so long only change them to 1, if its not then 0

Not sure if I was doing Delta or PI at the time but ehh worth a try.

0= false
1= true

Just incase you don’t know anything about coding (not to offense ijs, like to atleast have someone learn something)

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta]How do I cange npcs stance direction?

item.title: [Delta]How do I cange npcs stance direction?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:6, topic:463260”]should be something like

case NPCID:
      return NPCSTANCE;[/code][/quote]
Couldn't find that

[quote="strucker, post:4, topic:463260"][code]
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/265561-npc-facing-directions-walkingtype.html

check that.[/quote]
Yea this didn’t work I had a totally different void then that tutorial are you sure that was a [Delta] Tut?

Read full topic

What i mean stance direction on a npc is that lets say a npc spans and looks south how do I change that so that npcs can look in a different direction such as east, west, or north?
